Company_B Priority: Seeker_E, Seeker_B, Seeker_C, Seeker_D, Seeker_A (Seeker_C is 3rd).

Even though I am 3rd on Company_B's list, if my higher-ranked competitors (S_E and S_B) apply elsewhere (S_E to C, S_B to A based on their top choices), I have a strong chance of being accepted by Company_B. I will proceed with a formal application.
